title: ‘Succession’ Season 3, Episode 8 With Mark Mylod
description:
Joanna and Sean are back to talk about everything in the explosive penultimate episode of 'Sucession' Season 3. They discuss the dramatic cliffhanger ending involving Kendal (00:46), the cutting scene between Shiv and her mother (31:09), and later they are joined my director Mark Mylod to discuss filming this consequential episode (67:37).
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Joanna Robinson
Guest: Mark Mylod
Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
